help_user: WARNING: if your user information have any character like ", |, `, &, or etc, you will be command inject (we will fix this issue later)
help_token: the bot's token. you can get it from @BotFather
help_python: the path of the python and script, fill "python3" or "python" if you have no idea where python is.
help_allowList: you can use both allowGroup(a Group Object) and allowGroups(a Array of Group Object)
help_stdout: print these info can help you debug... maybe.
